install.name: S5 Box
install.author: Shape5.com
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: The S5 Box allows you to display any module in lightbox style popup activated by a class name. Choose either Mootools or Javascript library. It can display up to 10 S5 Box's by simply adding a class name to any HTML element and a module position to your template XML file. Check out the tutorial on http://www.shape5.com/demo/elegance/s5_box/ for more information.

param.default: Use the settings below to alter the width of the S5 Box's be sure to publish a module to each corresponding position for the box to be enabled. Please visit the following url for a tutorial http://www.shape5.com/demo/elegance/s5_box/

param.description: Choose either jquery or mootools javascript library

param.name: s5_moover
param.label: Mootools Version
param.description: If you have the mootools upgrade plugin enabled then you'll need to select mootools 124

param.name: s5_boxeffect
param.label: Effect Style
param.description: Choose the effect style for the S5 Box module when initialized via a user click

param.name: s5boxwidth1
param.label: S5 Box 1 Width
param.description: Enter the width you would like this S5 Box to show, it will be a percentage of the entire screen so entering '50' will show the box centered with a width of 50% of the entire screen
